Language.Text:
Day Eleven.
The rescue mission did not turn out as hoped. They got us. We're in a settlement built as a temporary residence at the tip of the ruins of Protean architecture. They call themselves Navi. I still don't know where they came from. They are living in a very primitive fashion and communication with them is nearly impossible.
When we by coincidence mentioned that we are in search of Protean civilization, their behavior towards us has changed. They will allegedly let us and Ripley go and will help us. However, only if we're good enough.
Tomorrow we run a life and death race. We have to win.
